lead_paragraph: The latest results on standardized exams offer good news for the de Blasio administration as it struggles to fix faltering schools.

headline.print_headline: City Students Match Peers Across State on English Test
headline.main: On English Tests, New York City Students Match Peers Across State

snippet: The latest results on standardized exams offer good news for the de Blasio administration as it struggles to fix faltering schools....
abstract: State Education Dept reports New York City students have finally matched state peers in standardized test scores for English Language and math; results are good news for Mayor Bill de Blasio's administration, which has been trying to turn around city's low-performing schools.
